title: STRONG MAGNETIC ATTRACTION / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, we will see a strong magnetic attraction. Dr. Marco Paret's students are doing powerful exercises in Brazil's nature, practicing the non-verbal technique, they learned in his school. The subject in the video experienced a unique hypnotic induction and after deepening the state with some specific sounds, he was moving his body and felt like he was magnetically drawn to the fascinator. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
